column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A Chinese driver  hit a motorcycle causing------ serious injuries to one man. The incident happened at 10:30 pm on October 4
column5: at the Royal Phnom Penh Hospital
column6: along the Russian Federation Boulevard in Sen Sok district.------According to a source from the scene
column7: a man driving a motorbike with white plates at 1BZ-1127 drove in front of a Chevrolet Escalade (?)  driven by a Chinese male.------Source
